topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Collaborative development tools

name: devsimpy
short_description: DEVSimPy is an advanced wxPython GUI for the modeling and simulation of systems based on the DEVS (Discrete EVent system Specification) formalism. Features include powerful built-in editor, advanced modeling approach, powerful discrete event simulation algorithm, import/export DEVS components library and more.
summary: Python-based GUI for discrete-event system modeling and simulation
